revised_title: George Martin Lees: A Pioneering Geologist and Oil Explorer
tldr: George Martin Lees was a renowned geologist and oil explorer who made significant contributions to the understanding of the geology of the Middle East and the discovery of important oil fields. He worked for the Anglo-Iranian Oil Company, where he held the position of Chief Geologist for nearly twenty-three years. Lees conducted pioneering geological surveys in Oman, Iraq, and other regions, and played a crucial role in the expansion of the company's activities worldwide.
